    Import PARAFAC model

    importPARAFAC.Rd

    Import PARAFAC model

    Usage

    importPARAFAC(
  path,
  prefix,
  numComponents,
  sep = ",",
  loadRDS = TRUE,
  header = TRUE
)

    Arguments

    path

    Path to a folder

    prefix

    Prefix file name

    numComponents

    Number of components in the model

    sep

    Separator character for the input files (default=",")

    loadRDS

    Load a previously saved RDS object of the model (default=TRUE)

    header

    Expect headers in the csv files (default=TRUE)

    Value

    List of: the PARAFAC model, the dataset used, the data as modelled

    Examples

    library(multiway)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(paramGUI)
library(pracma)
set.seed(0)

# Make PARAFAC model
processedFujita = processDataCube(Fujita2023, sparsityThreshold=0.99, centerMode=1, scaleMode=2)
model = parafac(processedFujita$data, nfac=2, nstart=1, verbose=FALSE)
if (FALSE) {
exportPARAFAC(model, processedFujita, prefix="Fujita_")
importedModel = importPARAFAC(path="./", prefix="Fujita_", numComponents=2)
}
